data.lyric:
[ti:Rich n***a s**t (Explicit)]
[ar:21 Savage/Metro Boomin/Young Thug]
[al:SAVAGE MODE II (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rich Nigga Shit (Explicit) - 21 Savage/Metro Boomin/Young Thug
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：Shéyaa Bin Abraham-Joseph/Jeffery Lamar Williams/Leland Wayne
[00:00.47]Composed by：Shéyaa Bin Abraham-Joseph/Jeffery Lamar Williams/Leland Wayne
[00:00.71]This world's all about money and p***y
[00:02.92]And you need to figure that out
[00:04.81]Once you figure that out
[00:06.30]You'll be better off in life
[00:20.35]Metro Boomin want some more n***a
[00:23.01]21 Savage：
[00:23.47]Rich n***a s**t I do a lot of
[00:25.79]N***a we be sippin' out the bottle
[00:28.16]I be fresh as hell rockin' Prada
[00:30.70]Hoppin' out the PJ with a model
[00:33.15]Swimmin' in a baddie tryna drown
[00:35.56]Every n***a with me got style
[00:38.02]I won't put a watch on 'less it cost a hundred thou'
[00:40.47]I want all the money and the power
[00:42.06]21 Savage：
[00:42.33]She took me for granted even when I tried to show her the better me
[00:47.22]I did a 69 with her friend I'm prayin' to God she don't tell on mе
[00:52.01]Used to ride MARTA now a n***a get head in the Cullinan
[00:56.39]Percocet got me floatin' like a butterfly but I'll sting you like a bumblebee
[01:01.81]Saint Laurent the only thing I put on my back
[01:04.30]Off-White jeans look like cooked crack
[01:06.64]I call the Porsche stomach 'cause the s**t snap
[01:09.22]Gave my girl a dub now her butt fat
[01:11.65]You might take your women to the Louis store
[01:14.09]My b***hes be askin' where's chanel at"
[01:16.39]I know you see them crosses yeah that's Chrome Hearts
[01:19.06]All this water on me where the whales at
[01:21.53]Stars in the ceilin' I'm where God at
[01:23.88]This supercharger whine like the car mat
[01:26.41]Savage got a whole lotta hits dawg
[01:28.85]I be droppin' bombs like Baghdad
[01:31.35]21 Savage：
[01:31.86]Rich n***a s**t I do a lot of
[01:34.37]N***a we be sippin' out the bottle
[01:36.80]I be fresh as hell rockin' Prada
[01:39.28]Hoppin' out the PJ with a model
[01:41.69]Swimmin' in a baddie tryna drown
[01:44.13]Every n***a with me got style
[01:46.60]I won't put a watch on 'less it cost a hundred thou'
[01:49.00]I want all the money and the power
[01:51.01]Young Thug：
[01:51.29]Yeah I've been in the vault with the gold in the back
[01:53.56]Ayy
[01:53.96]No longer my dawg 'cause you told you a rat
[01:56.06]Ayy
[01:56.42]Back-to-back Porsche me and Savage ridin' 'round
[01:58.60]In the town where the pipes have you loud out the back
[02:00.86]Skrrt skrrt skrrt
[02:01.62]Five hundred racks what it cost to be exact
[02:03.42]And it takes one mil' five hundred thousand racks
[02:06.02]Yeah
[02:06.22]I ain't even take the Rolls-Royce truck back
[02:08.05]Yeah yeah
[02:08.33]Bought the new one with the stars and the wheelbase stretched
[02:10.72]You can open up the door but you ain't gotta close it back
[02:13.31]Woo
[02:13.54]Everything electric baby everything a blessing
[02:15.89]It's a blessing
[02:16.32]Keep a ring and a Rollie for your next b***h
[02:18.34]Yeah
[02:18.78]N***as riding round in Chargers tryna split s**t
[02:21.20]Slatt
[02:21.21]I been ridin' with a cutter call it stick shift
[02:23.12]Brr
[02:23.76]When I eat I got a Goyard handkerchief
[02:25.66]Yeah
[02:26.03]Keep lil' mama on her knees and her ankle lift
[02:28.27]Facts
[02:28.45]I can get 'em knocked off without a finger lift
[02:30.04]21 Savage：
[02:30.60]Rich n***a s**t I do a lot of
[02:33.12]N***a we be sippin' out the bottle
[02:35.52]I be fresh as hell rockin' Prada
[02:38.01]Hoppin' out the PJ with a model
[02:40.42]Swimmin' in a baddie tryna drown
[02:42.92]Every n***a with me got style
[02:45.33]I won't put a watch on 'less it cost a hundred thou'
[02:47.77]I want all the money and the power
data.trans:
[ti:Rich n***a s**t (Explicit)]
[ar:21 Savage/Metro Boomin/Young Thug]
[al:SAVAGE MODE II (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.71]这世界就是关于钱和女人的
[00:02.92]你得把这点搞明白
[00:04.81]一旦你搞明白了
[00:06.30]你的生活就会变得更好
[00:20.35]Metro Boomin想要拥有更多 兄弟
[00:23.01]//
[00:23.47]有钱人的事 我做了很多
[00:25.79]兄弟 我们直接对着瓶子喝
[00:28.16]我穿着普拉达 潮流得不行
[00:30.70]带着女模特 从私人飞机上下来
[00:33.15]和漂亮妞疯狂缠绵 爽翻天
[00:35.56]我身边的每个人都超有型
[00:38.02]如果手表价值不足十万 我就不会戴
[00:40.47]我想要金钱和权力
[00:42.06]//
[00:42.33]即使我努力向她展示更好的自己 她也不把我当回事
[00:47.22]我和她朋友激情了一回 我祈祷上帝 但愿她不要告发我
[00:52.01]以前只能坐公交车 现在我在劳斯莱斯库里南里和姑娘亲热
[00:56.39]那种东西让我感觉自己是只蝴蝶 但我会像大黄蜂一样蜇你
[01:01.81]我的背上只背圣罗兰的包包
[01:04.30]Off-White牛仔裤 看起来就像那种东西
[01:06.64]我觉得保时捷还可以 挺能抓人眼球的
[01:09.22]让我的姑娘去整了型 现在她的臀部丰满了
[01:11.65]你可能会带你的女人去路易威登逛逛
[01:14.09]我的女人都在问 香奈儿在哪里
[01:16.39]我知道你看到了十字架 都是Chrome Hearts牌的
[01:19.06]我身上很多珠宝 简直让人目不暇接
[01:21.53]天花板上有星星 我就在上帝所在的地方
[01:23.88]涡轮增压让这车疯狂飞驰
[01:26.41]Savage拥有很多热歌 兄弟
[01:28.85]我的音乐就像炸弹一样轰动世界
[01:31.35]//
[01:31.86]有钱人的事 我做了很多
[01:34.37]兄弟 我们直接对着瓶子喝
[01:36.80]我穿着普拉达 潮流得不行
[01:39.28]带着女模特 从私人飞机上下来
[01:41.69]和漂亮妞疯狂缠绵 爽翻天
[01:44.13]我身边的每个人都超有型
[01:46.60]如果手表价值不足十万 我就不会戴
[01:49.00]我想要金钱和权力
[01:51.01]//
[01:51.29]我就像身处金库中 身后摆满了金子
[01:53.56]//
[01:53.96]你不是我的兄弟了 因为你告密了 你是个叛徒
[01:56.06]//
[01:56.42]我和Savage开着保时捷到处跑
[01:58.60]在城市中 香烟让你迷迷糊糊的
[02:00.86]//
[02:01.62]准确来说 花了五十万
[02:03.42]又花了一百万 甚至五亿 数都数不清
[02:06.02]//
[02:06.22]我甚至对旧的劳斯莱斯不屑一顾
[02:08.05]//
[02:08.33]买了一辆新的 天花板上可以看星星 轴距也更长
[02:10.72]你可以打开门 但你不用亲自关
[02:13.31]//
[02:13.54]一切都是电动的 宝贝 一切都是一种赐福
[02:15.89]是一种祝福
[02:16.32]为你下一个女人准备一枚戒指 一块劳力士
[02:18.34]//
[02:18.78]哥们开着道奇Charger 想要分享好东西
[02:21.20]//
[02:21.21]我走到哪儿都带着武器 暂且隐晦地称之为变速杆吧
[02:23.12]//
[02:23.76]当我吃饭的时候 我用的手帕是戈雅牌的
[02:25.66]//
[02:26.03]让小妞跪在地上 稍微提起膝盖
[02:28.27]事实
[02:28.45]我可以不费吹灰之力就把他们给消灭掉
[02:30.04]//
[02:30.60]有钱人的事 我做了很多
[02:33.12]兄弟 我们直接对着瓶子喝
[02:35.52]我穿着普拉达 潮流得不行
[02:38.01]带着女模特 从私人飞机上下来
[02:40.42]和漂亮妞疯狂缠绵 爽翻天
[02:42.92]我身边的每个人都超有型
[02:45.33]如果手表价值不足十万 我就不会戴
[02:47.77]我想要金钱和权力
